roleset.name: stop some action
roleset.note: DISPENSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dispense' based on financial subcorpus. No VNcls. Comparison with 'distribute' and 'end'. (from dispense.01-v)

role.descr: agent, entity causing something to end

example.name: dispense-v: from the corpus
example.text: RJR's executives have said they will dispense with certain brands, in particular, that aren't leaders in their markets.
example.arg: with certain brands , in particular , that aren't leaders in their markets

roleset.name: distribute
roleset.note: DISPENSE-V NOTES: nominal 'dispensation' based on BOLT-7. (from dispense.02-v)
DISPENSATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from dispensation.02-n)

example.name: dispense-v: made up
example.text: John dispensed bad advice to passers-by.

example.name: dispensation-n
example.text: Is the dosage dispensation safeguarded ? What guarantees the safety of the medicine ? If the medicine is used to make money , will curing patients be delayed ?
